title: Rouser
short: Some fresh design inpiration, built for Rouser by the Australian-based ED Studio
body: Built for Rouser by the Australian-based [ED](https://www.ed.com.au/) studio.. > Rouser uses the power of entertainment to talk to actual humans â€” something scientists, activists and algorithms really suck at. > > If we want a decent future, we need everyone, everywhere, wide awake and noisy as hell. This website is a true delight! Featuring a 3D bubble animation (with scroll & click interactivity), a great use of color contrast throughout, bold type and a strong call-to-action. [Check it out](https://www.rouserlab.com/)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites \[April 2020]](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
